description:
The ultimate alternative to a track pump when travelling, this slim yet powerful pump is a modern take on a classic frame pump. Traditional turned wood handle and braided stainless steel hose get mixed with modern innovations like the high-volume aluminium barrel and smart head that's compatible with both types of valves.

  • Braided hose is durable and improves comfort when pumping
  • Valves are protected
  • Durable good-looking wooden handle
  • Large volume chamber make for quick inflation
  • Compatible with Presta and Schrader valves
  • Frame mount included
  • Max pressure of 50psi makes this pump ideal for large volume tires
name: Fabric Megabar Dual Valve Mini Pump
